summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein, detailing shipping charges for services rendered on January 18, 2001. The total amount due is $19.66, with a payment deadline of February 13, 2001.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated January 29, 2001, and is for shipping services provided by FedEx.
The total amount due on the invoice is $19.66, with a payment deadline of February 13, 2001.
The package was picked up on January 18, 2001.
Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as the sender of the package.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge due to market conditions.
